Joshua or Josue__11.6__Burn their chariots with fire: : God so ordained, that his people might not trust in chariots and horses, but in him.
Joshua or Josue__11.18__A long time: : Seven years, as appears from chap. 14. 10.
Joshua or Josue__11.20__Hardened: : This hardening of their hearts, was their having no thought of yielding or submitting: which was a sentence or judgment of God upon them in punishment of their enormous crimes.
